name: basic-chat
description: A fork of peer chat for holochain with all but the core chat functionality removed

scripts.hc:build: rm -rf tmp-storage && mkdir -p ./dna && cd dna-src && hc package -o ../dna/basic-chat.dna.json
scripts.hc:test: sim2h_server & cd dna-src && TEST_NETWORK_TYPE=sim2h hc test
scripts.hc:make-holoscape: npm run hc:build && rm ui.zip && rm -rf ./ui && cd ui-src && npm run build && cd .. && cd ./ui && zip -r ../ui.zip ./*

author: Willem Olding (willem.olding@holo.host)
